name: Take Care, My Lord!
description:
You are the highest ranking knight for the king. The problem is, the king isn't a great dude, and a LOT of people want him dead.

Help him finish his daily routine without dying.

Use the arrow keys to move your knight, the king's loyal bodyguard.

Use WASD to control the king's new direction when a question mark appears above his head.

Run into the white bishop assassins to kill them before they can get to the king.

Hold shift while running into a peasant to get them out of your way for good.
